extensionName.description: Name of the extension; Should be kept as is when localizing.

extensionDescription.message: Simulate classical search bar by adding a search engine switch button.

addButton.description: A button for adding search engine in option page

resetButton.description: A button for reset search engine list in option page

resetButtonSecondTime.description: A button for confirm reset action

configTitleName.description: Option title for the name of a search engine

configTitleHomePage.description: Option title for the home page URL of a search engine

configTitleSearchUrl.description: Option title for the searching URL of a search engine

configTitleSearchUrlPostParameters.description: Option title for the post parameters of searching URL

configTitleEncoding.description: Option title for the input encoding of search terms

configSearchUrlDescription.message: Use {searchTerms} as placeholder of searching text
configSearchUrlDescription.description: Description of the URL of a search engine; {searchTerms} part should be kept as is when localizing

configTitleIcon.description: Option title for the icon of a search engine

browseButton.description: Button for selecting icon file for search engine option

configTitleStatus.description: Option title for the status of a search engine (enable / disabled)

configStatusEnabled.description: Option description for the enable status of a search engine

moveUpButton.description: Button for moving a search engine one item up in the list

moveDownButton.description: Button for moving a search engine one item down in the list

saveButton.description: Button for confirming the editing of selected search engine

removeButton.description: Button for removing a search engine from the list

backupPanelTitle.description: Title for the import / exporting section

importOverwriteButton.description: Button for import settings from a file

importAppendButton.description: Button for import settings from a file

importFailedAlert.description: This text will be alerted to user if import failed

exportButton.description: Button for export settings to a file
